If IRDY# == 1 and READ_DATA_PHASE == 1, then $stable(C/BE#) in the next cycle.
If IRDY# == 1 and WRITE_DATA_PHASE == 1, then $stable(C/BE#) in the next cycle.
If TRDY# == 1 and WRITE_DATA_PHASE == 1, then $stable(C/BE#) in the next cycle.
If READ_DATA_PHASE == 1 and TRDY# == 1, then $stable(C/BE#) in the next cycle.
